show.title: The Regenerative Agroforestry Podcast
show.summary:
A space where we investigate the possibilities of agroforestry, share experiences and analyse different strategies, tools and techniques. We bring you quality, in-depth content, so that we can build together regenerative agroforestry systems.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

title: #2 Innovative agroforestry systems on a diversified CSA farm with Matteo Mazzola
subtitle: #2 Innovative agroforestry systems on a diversified CSA farm with Matteo Mazzola
summary:
Matteo Mazzola shares with us some technical knowledge on how he is associating plants and animals to create productive and diversified systems on a small farm. We get into some detail on how he prepares his tree lines before planting, which plants consortiums he associates with his orchard and why, as well as the crucial relationships between grazing animals and trees.
